E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1978
Subject: Progress of Craig Reynolds
Dear Sir,
Craig Reynolds is hitting the ball well at AA Charlotte O's!
He has an AVG of .310, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1978
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Michiyo Arito



Date: Saturday, 6/7/1978
Subject: Progress of Clint Hurdle
Dear Sir,
Clint Hurdle has nothing more to prove at A Miami Orioles!
He has an AVG of .277 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/9/1978
Subject: Burt Hooton
Burt Hooton is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor
